metadata.title: Tikoncha - Digital Protection System
metadata.description: Tikoncha — a specialized system that protects people from digital distractions. Protect your children and yourself from social media and games.
metadata.keywords: digital protection, parental control, screen time, focus mode, child monitoring, Tikoncha, Uzbekistan

hero.description: Tikoncha — a modern solution to protect your children and yourself from digital distractions. Focus better, save time.

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Improve your quality of life and find digital balance with our system.

smartBlock.title: Smart Blocking
smartBlock.description: Automatically restricts games and social media at scheduled times. Your time — under your control.

focusMode.title: Focus Mode
focusMode.description: Helps you concentrate fully during study or work. Increase productivity by 3x.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Track changes with weekly and monthly reports. See your achievements clearly.

pricing.title: Choose the right plan for you
pricing.description: Tikoncha offers flexible terms for everyone.

features.stats: Statistics for today and yesterday only
features.limits: Limits: 1 extra schedule, max 2 apps, 1 rule, no "Allowlist"

features.family: Single price for up to 10 children

coins.title: AI Coins
coins.description: Affordable packages for using Bilimdon AI chat.
coins.note: *Coins are credited to the buyer's account.

mission.title: Protecting the education of future generations
mission.description: "Through Tikoncha, we protect every child's right to quality education. Our team combines pedagogy and technology to create a safe digital environment."
mission.quote: "Our goal is not to ban technology, but to teach how to use it properly."

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our strength lies in unity and experience.

footer.tagline: A trusted partner for next-generation education and digital security.
footer.copyright: © 2025 NEW EDU LLC. All rights reserved.
